casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffrey Robert PARISI 65P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 24, 2017 John W. Congleton, Assistant Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Michele Goldman, Attorney at Law, for Parisi, Jeffrey Robert.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of February 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of February 2017."
